thread.title: Voldemort Stars in Viral 'Beauty and the Beast'-'Harry Potter' Mashup Trailer
thread.title_full: Voldemort Stars in Viral 'Beauty and the Beast'-'Harry Potter' Mashup Trailer

author: michelle@dailydot.com (Michelle Jaworski)
title: Voldemort Stars in Viral 'Beauty and the Beast'-'Harry Potter' Mashup Trailer
text:
Screengrab via PistolShrimps/YouTube BTW 
Given Emma Watson ’s leading role in Beauty and the Beast , it was only a matter of time before someone decided to mash it up with Harry Potter . And now PistolShrimps has transfigured that already magical world with Harry Potter’s own “Beast.” 
Hermione and Voldemort ? We could never imagine—especially after what Voldemort put her and her friends through. But give Belle a wand, a unicorn, and some Apparition, and you’ve got yourself the start of the unlikeliest of bonds. Aside from Voldemort appearing to kill Maurice multiple times, it works a lot better than you’d expect. Up next after the break: Recommendations
